name: Fendi Casa Gilda armchair
description: - The color is easily customizable through a vraycolor node. - High quality polygonal model, correctly scaled for an accurate representation of the original object. - This model was constructed with utmost care and attention to detail. - Model is exported to Both smooth version and unsmooth version of non native formats. - The model is built to real-world scale. - System unit setup used-millimeters - Non-overlapping clean UV - Minimum 1000px texture resolution used. - Textures are tileable - This model contains 223,000 polygons. - Colors can be easily modified. - Different parts of the model. 3ds Max models are grouped for easy selection. - No part-name confusion when importing several models into a scene. - No cleaning up necessary just drop your models into the scene and start rendering. - No additional plugin is needed to open the model. --------------------------- File Formats: - 3ds Max 2015 V-Ray 3.4 scene (native application) - OBJ - FBX ------------------------------------------- Rate to let others know about the quality! To check out my other models you just need to click on my user name. Luxury Forniture Show more
short_description:
